ROM.Changelog:
03-22-2018 ============
#### frameworks/base/ * 310458a12fb Add toggle for face auto unlock (1/2)
#### vendor/aosp/ * 083e03d extract_utils.sh: Fix smali path for AOSP
03-21-2018 ============
#### frameworks/base/ * 29470ef7c0d Revert "pocket lock: Remove fingerprint events and gestures disabling it causes random bug with fp unlocking" * c29f3b5f165 base: KeyguardHostView.java: Dismiss keyguard automatically when face is recognized * 8a5693bbc30 Revert "Fix incorrect signatures"
#### packages/apps/Extensions/ * 6c68c65 Add toggle for face auto unlock (2/2)
03-20-2018 ============
#### frameworks/base/ * 98ae075dba3 Revert "add PreventRunning" * 99fe7b5e272 Revert "Add brevent patch"
#### vendor/aosp/ * 3c9383b Rename selective-spn-conf.xml to spn-conf.xml * 9d77e8d mk: update Chinese spn name * 10c408c Update SPN override for China Telecom * 811ef55 Add new Tuenti MNC SPN override name * aa975d9 SIM card setting: fixed Smartfren SPN override name * db9d7dd updated NOS/MEO apn names * 5f9ff02 Remove duplicate * 54b4290 Remove duplicate value for Sweden 2G * ac02acd cm: add selective based spn (2/2) * 27be954 Changes for china mobile carrier settings * c061fc3 Use apn-conf.xml from NitrogenOS * 2ef2c6b extract_utils.sh: Bring in line with LOS 14.1 * 8d65508 extract_utils: Use temporary folder for system dump * 41a5645 extract_utils: Fix pinning when not cleaning vendor dir * f8d3ed7 extract_utils: Allow to interrupt the extraction * 369bb1d extract_files: Adjust deodex path and tmpdir * 55084f5 extract_utils: implement LOCAL_MODULE_RELATIVE_PATH * f1de80e Fix extract_utils when not using blob sections * bc761ac extract_files: Add support for paths without system/ * 1e15446 extract_files: Add support for specifying blob sections * af292c9 extract_utils: support extracting directly from an ota zip * 1287eb4 extract_utils: Fix locale issue with sort * 92120ea extract_utils: fix extracting XML files containing binary characters * 042077f build: Update smali and baksmali to 2.2.1 * c0ba79f extract_utils: Fix cleanup variables assigment * 1dfbd0e build: Update smali and baksmali to 2.2.0 * bfb36ba extract_utils: Update smali/backsmali to v2.2b4 * d73b767 Extract Utils: implement oat2dex from CM * eb3fcb9 Add extract utils script from CM
03-19-2018 ============
#### build/ * 1b43f7d55 Bump security patch level to 2018-03-05
#### frameworks/av/ * 6a6523de5 AACExtractor: check bounds during seek
#### frameworks/base/ * f673fd2ad1a pocket: Add hardware acceleration and properly maintain SYSTEM_UI flags * b9ca636f1f4 pocket: Close sysfs resource after every write * d3e29b4961e Enhance wakelock for IPReachabilityMonitor * 946ad95a4c3 Fix incorrect signatures Chrome Stable and Google Webview had incorrect signatures. That was due to an incorrect method of determining the right signature. * 0e724b403eb pocket lock: Remove fingerprint events and gestures disabling it causes random bug with fp unlocking * ecaf7b7500e Add brevent patch Thanks to liudongmiao. Source: https://github.com/SudaMod/android_frameworks_base/commit/0e2f26fd5b97e9d5cd0375de2ee6da387d60f91e * 3f010287b71 add PreventRunning * 3d5732a1232 Improving Pie date for simplified Chinese * 17efa3385ac Improving simplified Chinese Translation
#### packages/apps/ContactsCommon/ * 700670e4 Update Chinese Simplified translation
#### packages/apps/Extensions/ * dac70b9 Improving simplified Chinese Translation
#### packages/apps/Messaging/ * c795370 Add missing res/values/cm_strings.xml * 5615127 Fix string "Swipe right deletes conversation" not using translation * 4f2a1b4 Messaging: Enable swipe at archive mode * 29f67d7 Messaging: show snackbar instead of toast when deleting conversation * ba75349 Messaging: Swipe right to delete conversation * 840a2bb Messaging: Implement option for swipe to delete.
#### system/bt/ * 774c650a BNEP: Check received frame type * 14bcd458 Remove memory reference to invalid mem in error log * 357ea334 SDP: Include the offset in sdp_disc_server_rsp * 2c9eb037 SDP: Pass the bounds to process_service_*_rsp * a0bf78c3 Fix unexpected behavior in reading BNEP packets * 52ebba01 PAN: Fix Use-after-free in bta_pan_data_buf_ind_cback * 48f52f79 AVRCP: Check the number of text attributes requested * d64cd19d Allocate/free the SDP connection timers only during stack startup/shutdown * 68b38026 Removed alarm callback execution statistics * e2640b88 Fix unexpected behavior in SDP
#### vendor/aosp/ * 8fa3fd7 prebuilt: update prebuilt apks and zip
03-08-2018 ============
#### external/libavc/ * 04c9906 Decoder: Adding Error Check for Output Buffer Size in Shared Display Mode. * db6bf49 Decoder: Fixed memory overflow in shared display mode.
#### external/libmpeg2/ * 98beb25 Fixing Underflow of ps_dec->u2_num_mbs_left * 6337ea6 Adding Error Check for Output Buffer Size * d63479b Correcting Buffer Allocation for Shared Display
#### frameworks/base/ * 521bbf12c8e Revert "base: silent mode is back"
